title: (x) "Andy" oblique sans - Delta Jaeger {Florian}
content:
Hello, I'm new here but hoping someone could help out?

I can't quite put my finger on this font, any ideas?

Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063305im_/http:/typophile.com/files/and_4959.jpg)
author: cld6

comments.content:
Hi James,

welcome to Typophile!  
That's [Delta Jäger](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063305/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/delta-be/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D72%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DAndy%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D25).  
F
Yup, that looks like the one. Thank you!

Actually, that doesn't seem to be it!

Although very similar, the one I'm looking for has a double barrelled "a" character.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063305im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a_4802.jpg)

Hmm, I'll have to keep searching!
